alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Chickasaw; Lee; Monroe; Pontotoc; Union (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 25 at 11:35AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Chickasaw, eastern Calhoun, southeastern Union, Pontotoc, Lee and northwestern Monroe Counties through 1215 PM CDT... At 1135 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Ecru to near Vardaman to near Eupora. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tupelo, Pontotoc, Houston, Verona, Okolona, Trace State Park, Tombigbee State Park, Saltillo, Guntown, Shannon, Vardaman, Plantersville, Ecru, Prairie, New Harmony, Pratts Friendship, Randolph, Troy, Pyland and Trebloc. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Chickasaw; Lee; Monroe; Pontotoc; Union
